alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 10:40AM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Marion, Lamar and Forrest Counties. * WHEN...Monday night. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel is expected. A few power outages are possible.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for Mississippi can be obtained by visiting mdottraffic.com, dotd.la.gov in Louisiana and idrivearkansas.com in Arkansas.
